name:
Bee Butter Balm
Handbag size (15ml)
description:
Everyone loves soft skin.

This natural balm provides excellent intensive care for dry skin on any area of your body.  You can use this product as preventative or curative.

Thanks to the rejuvenating/moisturising properties of the organic olive oil combined with the intensive nourishment of the Coconut oil and the health giving properties of the Propolis , Beeswax and essential oils.

Wherever you may use this balm it will leave that part of the body feeling deeply nourished, moisturised and rehydrated.

Because this balm is developed to soak into the skin 100% it is more like an intensive soak in a luxurious hot bath.

If you have some tired, hard or peeling skin just use the balm on the affected area and let the magic of mother natures ingredients soak in and regenerate your skin.  Then allow the beeswax to act as a protector to prevent any problems happening again.

Ingredients:
Beeswax								
Propolis
Almond Oil
Olive Oil
Coconut Oil
Lavender essential oil

name: 100% Natural Honey (340g)
description:
All over the world honey is mainly known as a food and not as a medicine.  These days we are now reconsidering the importance of honey for human and animal health.  Many specialists from countries such as New Zealand, France. India etc have proven that honey is also a medicine if obtained and used under certain circumstances.

Today Honey is used externally for the treatment of healing wounds burns, and scars. “

Honey, considered mainly as an excellent source of energy, a natural food, has also many interesting medicinal properties.

Anti-bacterial, Antibiotic, Anti-inflammatory, energiser, immune system stimulator, laxative, calms the nervous system and helps regeneration of connective tissues and cell membrane (which in turn helps protect the cells from invasion from bacteria).  The best energy for any muscle, including the heart which is a muscular pump.    Honey nourishes the gums, thus helps a better nutrition of teeth themselves.

Helps with fever as Honey gives energy to the white blood cells which can then eliminate more easily the causes of the fever, i.e. bacteria, viruses.

name: Propolis (15ml)
description:
Propolis is used world-wide in thousands of pharmacies, medical offices, human or veterinary medicine clinics.

Propolis is the most important product used in the beehive because of it’s anti-bacterial or anti-radiation properties.

The word Propolis translated means DEFENDER OF THE CITY hence why Propolis is good to build up your Immune System and fight off any attack from bacteria or parasite fungus or virus.

This is ideal for keeping in the cupboard as a stand by for that moment when you feel like you are coming down with something or take just before the onset of winter to build up your defences.

name: Bee Pollen (110 grams)
description:
Bee pollen has been called a miracle food.  Nutrionally speaking.  Pollen is probably the most important “new” food of the twentieth century to be made available.

Bee pollen may also be considered possibly the “oldest” food on the face of the earth as bees and flowers evolved about the same time.

Like all the products coming from the bee hive bee pollen as well as bursting with vitamins minerals and amino acids, bee pollen also has anti-bacterial properties.

People have found after 10 – 14 days of taking bee pollen they are bursting with energy and clarity about life in general.

name: Propolis for Pets
description:
Propolis can be useful in the treatment of: -

Respiratory conditions
Bacterial/fungal infections
Immune system booster
Ear infections
Mouth problems
Digestive Disorders.

Improves fitness and energy levels. Adding to a healthy overall balanced pet.

Available in a concentrate or spray bottle for your convenience.

name: Skin Repair Balm for Pets
description:
This balm is excellent for many different skin irritations and can also be used as a barrier balm or to help treat wounds, scars, bites burns and any minor skin ailments.


It is completely harmless if ingested.

Available in 30ml or 60ml sizes to suit the size of your pet.

name: Pollen for Pets
description:
Can be used as a health supplement. Added to the daily diet of animals and pets it provides 96 elements including vitamins, minerals, enzymes, protein and amino acids.  

Studies have shown that bee pollen helps with hay fever and other allergies.  

Results have shown an increase in power of resistance to disease because of an improved immune system function.

Bringing about a noticeable improvement of weight, general good health and temperament.
